items: Stand in front of the StrongMan Atlas Stones with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Squat down and grip the stone with both hands, keeping your back straight and your chest up.
Use your legs and hips to lift the stone off the ground and bring it up to your lap.
Lean back slightly and hug the stone to your chest.
Take a deep breath and brace your core.
Drive your feet into the ground and explosively lift the stone up to your shoulder.
Hold the stone on your shoulder for a few seconds, then lower it back down to your lap.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.
Improves grip strength and forearm development
Targets multiple muscle groups including the back, shoulders, legs, and core
Enhances functional fitness and real-world strength
Provides a unique and challenging workout experience
